General.Name: Amazing Microelectronic
General.Description: Amazing Microelectronic Corp. provides electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection related solutions in Taiwan. It offers ESD solutions for use in industrial, automotive, and LCM panel, as well as IPC, and DVR and medical electronics applications; and EMI filters for use in LCD/camera display, multimedia card/secure digital memory card, and keypad products of mobile phones and hand held portable devices. It also provides analog switches for video, LAN, Bus, and USB applications; HDMI re-drivers and switches; and RS485/RS232 interface IC solutions for industrial and medical process control, automobile electronics, monitoring system, and building automation networks. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 736, JhongJheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
